      • AggregatingSubscriptionManager

        public AggregatingSubscriptionManager(java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService executor,
                              HiveSource hiveSource,
                              java.util.Properties properties,
                              AggregatingSubscriptionManager.Listener listener)
        Create a new subscription manager
        Parameters:
        executor - a single threaded executor
        hiveSource - the source of the hive to attach to
        properties - the session properties for the hive
        listener - optionally a listener that will get a call when any of the values in the cache changed
